Name: The Big Bang Theory
Title: The Romance Recalibration
Desc: Penny and Amy go on a spa weekend; Wolowitz and Koothrappali try to fix a squeaky floorboard.
LongDescription: Penny thinks Leonard is taking her for granted and decides to go on a spa weekend with Amy; Wolowitz and Koothrappali try to fix a squeaky floorboard in the baby's room.
